0.post_text: Our crispy fries just got fluffy! Between 17 Jan - 6 Feb 2018, get this ‘upsized’ Fries Cushion (60cm) for free when you order SGD50 or more worth of McDonald’s on McDelivery (App/Web) in a single day. It’s limited to the first 30 customers who order between 5pm to 11pm. Be sure to hurry and order your favourite meals today! Terms and conditions apply. More details at http://bit.ly/McDeliveryFriesCushion

1.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0530 hours on 17 January 2018. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

6.post_text:
We know there’re days when you prefer to eat light. With 10 easy choices to pick from, simply enjoy an under-500 calorie meal to suit your mood, any time of the day. 

The next time, how about starting the day with a Sausage McMuffin (with Corn Cup and Coffee) or have a Grilled Chicken Salad (with Corn and Dasani Water) for lunch or dinner?

comments.message:
Sorry to say McD.. 

1. Despite numerous feedbacks from customers, the Cheesy Loaded Fries still not loaded with cheese... 

2. Your prices seems to be going up higher and higher making other fast food outlets seem like better choices..

3. And the biggest NO-NO of all is you have removed one of Singapore's love affairs, the Quarter Pounder and replaced it with the very Meh "Angus" that you're so proud of ..

Better start listening to your customer's feedbacks..
Cheesy loaded fries? Cmon I even pay money to top up the nacho cheese sauce.
Suddenly your cheese fries become pathetic again. Little sauce stingy
I will not patronise McD anymore till they bring back the Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese... now I'm moving over to Carl's Jr... better Angus compared to McD's Anus burger...
When is the prosperity burger coming gdi

Bought the cheesy loaded fries for the second time hoping it won't be a disappointment like the first time. Sad to say, I got the same disappointment for the second time. Can't understand why we consumers have to pay so much just for that pathetic amount of cheese and bacon bits. I feel so cheated by Macdonalds.
Irza Zulkifli You missed these new drumlets in Singapore. They were brilliant

Just saw a customer ordered the cheesy fries from the Boon Keng McD. Not too bad. Finally saw some improvements... slowly catching up to KFC but KFC still took it home man... you want cheesy fries... go to KFC.

The last time I had a McDonald's burger was 2 yrs ago, during SG50. Last week I had a McSpicy and I was shocked that the burger had shrinked 40%! It looked really pitiful and pathetic. Are you doing to boost profit? I think you are chasing your customers away.

What a waste. Mcds always removing the nice burgers. Please bring back Angus Mushroom Supreme. The standard of this bbq pulled chicken burger is really low, i would rather eat mcchicken.

Ordered the BBQ Pulled Chicken burger. It is disappointing. Watched a review video which gave 2/5 for the burger and 2/5 for the chicken wings,, at first I don't believe. Now I do. just ate it at elias mall macs, its probly worst than a regular Mc chicken my nephew is having, not worth given the premium price.

Was served at Siglap McDonalds, did a takeaway of 9 pcs McNuggets Meal and Double Cheeseburger plain, and when handed my order, I was repeated the right order I did. Came home to find the food packed entirely wrong. My McNuggets became mcwings and my double cheeseburger plain wasn’t plain at all. So am i overcharged too? Called the branch number twice but no one picked up. Quite certain I won’t be waiting 30 mins to keep calling just to eat a meal right.

comments.message: Dear McD.. Bring back McGriddle peleaseeee.. My breakfast is fullfeeling with it hehehehehehehehehe

To the management reading this, I'm a regular customer providing u feedback. Tampines east community centre branch service level is terrible! Food ordering long wait, food collection long wait, food wrong order, tea flask for top up is cold, etc. Granted the branch is small but a McDonald experience should not be like that! The staffs seem to want to do their job well but they are understaffed and uncertain what task to do next. I'm 100% sure I'm not the only customer feeling this. Come for breakfast @8am and see yourself, especially weekend. It's been like this for longest time with no improvement. Hope u do something soonest to help your poor staffs carrying your brand, even if it's a small outlet.
McGriddle pls 😫
Buy for me dear.. Sutha Jeganathan
Faster bring back mcgriddle!!!
McGriddles plzzzzzz 😩😩😩😩 Avia Ng Ruth Lai Fiona Quah

12.post_text: Coming soon to a McDonald’s near you – 4 Jan 2018.

comments.message:
Hi McDonald's, I understand the brand bringing a new offering is simply part of refreshing your menu and product strategy. No harm in that. Fair enough. However, why include this at the expense of removing the Double Quarter Pounder? It is clearly a favourite, including mine. Are your sales figures islandwide reflecting otherwise? This move has obviously not been received favourably judging by the reactions. While you may have good intentions of introducing a quality product, isn't customer preference and choice the basis of every successful product? Even if it's in in fact a better quality product, if the customer does not perceive it to be so, albeit possibly the reality is it is, should you not still listen? Or at the very least provide an acceptable explanation? Kindly do so, as I'm sure we still hold McDonald's close to our hearts. 

#BringBackOurDoubleQuarterPounder

I wonder if McDonalds are simply playing deaf, dumb and blind to all the feedbacks from their customers. The Quarter Pounder (and Double) was the best thing ever on their menu.. nice, juicy and tasty and everybody wants it back. But they switch it with this horrible, dry beef patty and expect us to go WOW just because they keep throwing around the word "Angus".
I'll go for this favourite blue mountains of mine anytime against those "Angus".$11.90+7% gst comes with those chips. no sweat.😁
Where is the patty?
My original angus lol it is a joke.Conned by the clown again.It is a far cry from the photo.Oh I get it,the photo is for illustration purpose only.
Actually nothing more than a normal cheese burger, just using "Angus" to trick people into buying. While you're at it, might as well start selling "original wagyu" beef burgers.
Quarter Pounder left without a notice and farewell 😅
Yes what happened to my quater pounder that i use to order ALL the time?
Quarter Pounder has left and gone. Then again...marketing ploy lah. Let you all be harp on it to come back. Then they release it back...then you all rejoice. Just like the cheese fries.

I’m a huge fan of the quarter pounder (which I always order whenever I go for a non breakfast meal at McDonald’s) and was disappointed that they have decided to stop selling quarter pounder. I was hesitant to try the “Signature” angus beef burger but finally tried it yesterday and then that was the biggest disappointment. Look at my burger, the beef

Dear McDonalds,

I guess that I don't need that Angus though
Now you're just somebody that I used to know

#BringBackQuarterPounder
You mean our favourite the Quarter Pounder which has disappeared?

I just ordered BK’s double angus mushroom cheeseburger. Each patty is juicy & almost twice as thick as regular patties.

Lots of mushrooms in the sauce. THAT is premium. Not this crap burger u serve!
Ordered Buttermilk crispy chicken burger via delivery, got nasi lemak burger's patty. Missed out that signature slice of pineapple. And the only thing left in the burger was disappointment:(

Oh pls macdonalds. So much wayang about your 'loaded' cheese fries, apologies and what not, ordered 2 days ago, still as disappointing as the first time. Nothing's changed. We don't expect 5 star customer service, we just would like to be served what we have paid for. 2005 u introduced the mcspicy, and mcspicy double. Couple years later, CLAIMED to have come up with a new mcspicy, where 2 'slim' patties were put into 1, and tadaaa the all new mcspicy for a higher price. Couple yrs later, brought back the double mcspicy for even higher the price. Full of bull. But when it comes to your packing of fries, not full. When it comes to your fudge in the sundae, not full. Time after time again, i've given in and ordered mcdelivery because it's the 'easiest' option. But it's okay. That was so last year. Seriously, don't come act cute with your cheesy fries poem apology all. Just for show. Try replying customers' msges on fb with more sincerity.
I just received a call from Kim Jong Un and he said he'll stop his nuclear testings if you bring the quarter pounder back.
It's not my favorite and I want it to go away for good!  Bring back the Quarter Pounder!

Might as well get a McDouble lol  

Same cheese, sauce, pickles, onions..
The only thing I bid farewell to in 2017, was my dear favorite quarter pounder with cheese. And it's still not coming back.
Disgusting Anus Burger... bring back the Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese!!!
Bring back Quarter Pounder and introduce McSatay Burger. Make it available in both beef and chicken. Tender juicy meat in sweet traditional peanut sauce. Sure win. McDonald's
Since when did this become our favourite? Please... It seems customer feedback means nothing to you. Just bring back the quarter pounder.

This is the McD Angus Mushroom burger - dry, measly and pathetic!!! 🤢😡😠
McDonalds - Be Sorry And Bring back QUARTER POUNDER!!!!
McDonald's, stop pretending we customers don't want the quarter pounder by a majority. Replacing it with a less for more burger is just insulting

I opened it up again and realized that the burger only had cheese & tartar sauce inside.. no fish at all.. Mcdonald's I know u are very busy but could u pls train ur staff to be more careful?

The cheesy loaded fries were also a letdown, there was barely any cheese & mayo sauce. It was a truly disappointing Christmas dinner.

Had a satisfying meal Carl's Jr. Singapore. What the Quarter Pounder lacked in quality, it made up for it in quantity. Thank God you guys didn't kill it for... oh wait.

#noqualitynoquantity

I had always loved Angus burger until I received it like THIS...cheese all stuck on the box with the lower bun, to the side.
And waiting for an explaination from Mcdonalds took almost 3 weeks. Oh wells... maybe I shd cut down on fastfood lah . LOL.
Its bad. Really bad. Please take off from menu and put back quarter pounder. At least the pounder is juicy
You know what was keeping it true? The original double quarter pounder with cheese. The flavourful patty with a slice of cheese. That was nofilter
IT TASTE DISGUSTING!!! BRING BACK THE DOUBLE QUARTER POUNDER WITH CHEESE!!!

More ex & less meat than double QP. Makes no sense! U really know how to piss customers off. First by removing QP then with your pathetic cheese fries. Even the so called improved one has barely any sauce!
wheres the cheese?
just had this original angus and it tastes just like hamburger. huge step down from the previous version.
4am I order my breakfast it's 5:26am now my order is not here
McFail Angus...hahahaha

21.post_text:
Echoing its name - The Original Angus, we keep it real with #nofilter by staying true to the original flavour of 100% Angus beef, with only a little salt and pepper added. 

100% Angus Beef. No additives. No fillers. #BelieveInOurBeef

comments.message: This is super overpriced. Don't get fooled by the picture. Slightly larger cone with the same amount of standard vanilla ice cream you get from normal vanilla cone. Stingy amount of sauce and one thin slice of oreo. Tried it once and never again.
I feel u could hav been more generous with the sauce... tastes no diff from normal vanilla cone ice-cream... will not try again.
See the different 😔 so disappointed
it's suppose to come with bacon bits. what are you guys even doing.

Bought once..nothing special..and yes its tasted the same as the vanilla 80 cents cone ice cream only in bigger size...the toppings that caramel sauce so damn stingy! and an 1 small oreo on top...
Wasted! My money!! Shld have  top up a few more cents and buy a whole 1.5 litre tub of ice cream more worth it...and when i bought it no free pack of oreo....anyway...no hard up on the oreo thou 😂😂
